debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, The Walt Disney Company had total debt of $83,854 million. The company's leverage ratio was 3.81x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: The Walt Disney Company reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 17.0%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
